page.title: 16Holy Trinity Church Contd.
page.content: Main Service of the week is Parish Communion at 10.00, which is a sung service. An average of 30 people receive communion. Children have their own lessons in the Church Room. Prayers - 18.00 - Daily except Mondays The Church bell is rung to call people to prayers but even if no-one comes prayers are said on their behalf by the vicar. A service of Holy Communion is held each morning (ex. Mondays) provided at least one person is there with the priest. Baptisms - an average of 6 a year take place at Parish Communion. Weddings and funerals are also conducted.
